Name: Campirinha
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE lime and grapefruit in base of shaker to release juices. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.
Review: This bright red fruit-laden cocktail has the looks to appeal to all, but its bittersweet flavour is more polarising.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2006 by Jamie Lawton at Orchid in Auckland, New Zealand.
